title: 21 The James Altucher Take Over: How I Live My Dreams
description: After inspiring everyone to Choose Yourself in episode #19, James Altucher returns to take over as the host on The School of Greatness. With Altucher in charge, the microphones have been turned around and I'm the one who is answering the questions. I share things I've never shared before about chasing my dreams of being a [因
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
